name: No Mayo 3 Cheese Spinach Dip
author: iloveroman
summary: Creamy spinach dip that tastes just like the one at the restaurant.
ingredients: 1 ½ (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
5  (6 inch) pita breads, cut into wedges
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place the  , cream cheese, spinach, red bell pepper, red onion, mozzarella cheese, and Romano cheese into a blender
Cover the blender and blend until well-mixed
Pour dip into a baking dish; sprinkle the Cheddar cheese on top
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and the cheese is melted, about 30 minutes
The dip will be runny but will thicken as it cools
Meanwhile, arrange the pita wedges on a baking sheet
Drizzle with vegetable oil, and season with salt
Bake in the preheated oven until pita wedges are toasted, about 10 minutes
